related_questions.question:
There is a new mature tourism park in my town called Panorama Kedah Tempunak. The park is located in Tempunak    Kapuas village. It only takes thirty minutes from my house by motorcycle to go there. It is a very big park, with colorful
flowers everywhere. There are also many fruit plants, such as papayas, rambutans, rose apples, and dragon fruits. In
the middle of the park, there is a big lake. ive can explore the lake by using small duck-like boats. Next to the lake, there
is a grassy landscape that makes the park looks green and fertile. The park has some outdoor benches and hammocks
where we can sit and enjoy the view while eating snacks and drink. The park is really worth a visit.
36. What can we find in Panorama Kedah Tempunak?
A indoor benches
B. small river
C. friendly villagers
D. grassy landscape
37. How long does it take to go there from the writer house?
A. 20 minutes
B. 25 minutes
C.30 minutes
D. 35 minutes
38 Which statement is NOT TRUE about the park based on the text above?
A. There is a big lake in the middle of the park
C. there are lion-shape boats in the lake.
B. There are many fruit plants in the park
D. the park is located in Tempunak​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

nyimak iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya

related_questions.question:
Mrs. Retno is my Biology techer. She is good techer.    She likes teching very much. Mrs. Terno is rather tall
(tinggi). She is abourt 165 cm. Her skin (kulitnya) is light
and she has wavy hair (keriting). Mr. Heru is a Math teacher.
he is fat (gemuk) and short. His skin is dark brown. He looks
very fierce (galak) but actually be is very good teacher, most
of the students like him.
a.
24. How many people are there in the text?
a. 2
b. 3
c. 4
d. 1
25. Does mrs. Retno have a light or black skin?
a. Yes, she does
c. Light skin
b. No, she doesn't d. Black skin
26. Who teaches (mengajar) Math?
Mr. Heru does
c. Mrs. Retno does
b. The writer does
d. The reader does
27. Who teaches Biology ?
a. The reader does c. Mrs. Retno does
b. Mr. Heru does
d. The writer does
28. Today is Sunday. The day after tomorrow is ....
a. Monday
c. Wednesday
b. Tuesday
d. Saturday​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

24. A. 2

25. C. light skin

26. A. Mr. Heru does

27. C. Mrs. Retno does

28. B. Tuesday

semoga terbantu, maap kalo salah. Kalo bener jangan lupa jadiin jawaban tercerdas yak✌

24. B.3

25. B.She doesn't

26. A.Mr Heru does

27. C. Mrs Retno does

28. B. Tuesday

25. The one with the light skin is Mrs. Terno

related_questions.question:
Good morning. Allow (ijinkanlah saya) me to introduce    myself (memperkenalkan diriku). My full name is Fina
Natalia but you can call me Lia. I was born in Batam on
Nevember 24 th, 2006.
I am the second daughter of three children. My father
has two daughters (putri) and one son (putra). I love
listening music and singing. Would you like to my house
sometime? I live at joyoboyo street number 13. I love
studying here very much, thank you.
33. Simon....like to drink milk (-).
a. Don't 
b. Isn't
c. Aren't
d. Doesn't

a. Fina
c. Batam
b. Natalia
d. Fina Natalia

a. 13 
b. 14
c. 15
d. 16

does she have?
a. 5
b.4
c. 3
d. 2​

answers.answer:

33.d. Doesn't

34.d. Fina Natalia

35.d.16

36.a.5
